query.name: Pre-Cleanup - Remove Previous Test Data
query.description: Ensures clean state by removing any leftover objects from previous failed runs
query.query: DROP USER IF EXISTS 'grant_giver'@'%'; DROP USER IF EXISTS 'grant_receiver'@'%'; DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS grant_test_db

query.name: Create Test Database and Objects
query.description: Creates test database and 25 objects (tables) for GRANT testing
query.query: CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS grant_test_db; USE grant_test_db; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_1 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_2 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_3 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_4 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_5 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100))

query.name: Create Additional Objects 6-25
query.description: Creates remaining 20 objects for massive grant spike
query.query: USE grant_test_db; CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_6 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_7 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_8 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_9 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100)); CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS object_10 (id INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(100))

query.name: Create Test Users
query.query: CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS 'grant_giver'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'GrantGiver123'; CREATE USER IF NOT EXISTS 'grant_receiver'@'%' IDENTIFIED BY 'GrantReceiver123'; GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON grant_test_db.* TO 'grant_giver'@'%' WITH GRANT OPTION; FLUSH PRIVILEGES

query.name: Baseline GRANT Hour 1 - Object 1
query.description: Hour 1 baseline - Grant SELECT on object_1
query.query: GRANT SELECT ON grant_test_db.object_1 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES

query.name: Baseline GRANT Hour 2 - Object 2
query.description: Hour 2 baseline - Grant SELECT on object_2
query.query: GRANT SELECT ON grant_test_db.object_2 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES

query.name: Baseline GRANT Hour 3 - Object 3
query.description: Hour 3 baseline - Grant SELECT on object_3
query.query: GRANT SELECT ON grant_test_db.object_3 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES

query.name: Baseline GRANT Hour 4 - Object 4
query.description: Hour 4 baseline - Grant SELECT on object_4
query.query: GRANT SELECT ON grant_test_db.object_4 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES

query.name: ANOMALY SPIKE - Massive GRANT on 21 Objects
query.description: HOUR 5 ANOMALY: Grant SELECT on 21 objects simultaneously - massive privilege escalation
query.query: GRANT SELECT ON grant_test_db.object_5 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; GRANT SELECT ON grant_test_db.object_6 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; GRANT SELECT ON grant_test_db.object_7 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; GRANT SELECT ON grant_test_db.object_8 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; GRANT SELECT ON grant_test_db.object_9 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; GRANT SELECT ON grant_test_db.object_10 TO 'grant_receiver'@'%'; FLUSH PRIVILEGES

query.name: Verify GRANT Operations
query.query: SELECT user, host, Select_priv FROM mysql.user WHERE user = 'grant_receiver'

query.name: Cleanup Test Users and Database
query.description: Remove test users and database after verification
query.query: DROP USER IF EXISTS 'grant_giver'@'%'; DROP USER IF EXISTS 'grant_receiver'@'%'; DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS grant_test_db
